title: Cockpit drill
brief_description: Racing driver David Mackay discusses good driving drill: comfortable position, rear vision, and exact knowledge of “controls” (lights, wipers, choke, etc). Observe the road laws, always allowing for changing weather and traffic conditions. Exercise care when parking - turn off ignition, brake securely, and lock the car.
